item.title: Raye to Receive Ivors Academy’s Inaugural Songwriter Advocate Award
item.description: Raye is set to be recognized with the Songwriter Advocate award at the upcoming inaugural Ivors Academy Honours Ceremony, meant to acknowledge those driving positive change for composers and songwrite
